channel.title: Montfort School of Yercaud on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Montfort School of Yercaud on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Kurseong
item.description: The first-daywe got little suspicious with the transport rates being quoted by Kanchan View Hotel Manager. We reported that back to Calcutta the tour operator Mr. D. Ghosh. But once you are away from home and you have limited option to negotiate a bargain. The Hotel person by now have charged us 2500 for the first day covering only Tagore Smritivan , monastery and forest bungalow. For the second day we paid 2500 to cover 5/6 places but the distance was more.
